wo jinwan shuijiaoqian shunbian banide goutou zha le feiwu 
niqu zhuanfa liangtiao xiaojinli baoyou ni qinma jinwan buyong si le 
yaobuyao laozi gei ni qinma laiyitao juntiquan liangquan ba ni qinma hei pi gan lan le 
huozangchang dadianhua wenwen ni qinma yao jifenshu 
wo yongyuan shiduide ni qinma yongyaun qushi le 
ni zai zheyang ni qinmade zhuidaohui wo jiu buqule 
ni hua zhemeduo zenmm buqu ni qinma fentoushangmian manmanshuo 
wo yidao ba ni qinma yijiufen 
wo ba ni qinma luanxibao wachulai geini zuo shousi 
yequ heide gen ni qinma pi yiyang 
ni qinma lingwei zai yequ ni jinqu chubulaile 
huozangchang dadianhua shuo ni qinma zhanguo le danshi kaolvdao ni naotan dou zhibuqi de qingkuang zhijie lian guo shaole gei ni banfan 
waimian you shiqige nande doushuo shi ni yedie ni ganjin renqin quba 
duimian zai liang goupai shangmian xieman ni baba sile 
suiran shuo ni buzhidao nidie daodi shi shei danshi jiabuzhu ni zai paiwei li luanren
